original_text:
Desert creatures will meet with hyenas,
    and wild goats will bleat to each other;
there the night creatures will also lie down
    and find for themselves places of rest.
korean_text: 들짐승이 이리와 만나며 숫염소가 그 동류를 부르며 올빼미가 거기에 살면서 쉬는 처소로 삼으며

sentences.original_text: Desert creatures will meet with hyenas
and wild goats will bleat to each other
there the night creatures will also lie down
and find for themselves places of rest
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신들을 위해 쉼터를 찾을 것입니다
